attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Permit by petiton, say 10% of voting adults, the prosecution of any Minister of State where public disssatisfaction deems their Ministry failing their brief and "Not Fit for Purpose". Imprisonment term of the Minister and/or officials for culpable failure to do what they are elected to do.

rejection.details: The title of a petition should eb a request for action.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
